title: What are some good examples of web apps having artificial intelligence? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quick, Draw! However, since ML is usually done on the client - many of the most popular web apps / sites you use, most probably use ML for their functionality: Google search makes use of ML for query understanding, answer models, …Photo tagging for people and objects most probably use ML - across Google image search, Google photos, Facebook, Pinterest, …Content recommendations often are based on ML models - Amazon, Netflix, Facebook content, YouTube, …Video tagging, captioning - YouTube, Facebook, …Spelling, grammar checking, translating - in various productivity tools often make use of ML language and other AI techniquesGamesAds targeting - pretty much everywhere ….
